title: Why haven't i gotten into pbe yet its been a couple monthes.
body: I have been waiting so long to get into pbe and i would like to know i haven't gotten in yet.

replies.body:
PBE testers can be chosen by a plethora of ever-changing criteria. Generally, we look for really active players who give great feedback and are a positive influence in the community. We can sometimes choose players based on their playstyle, so if we're looking to rework Ryze, we may send out a group of invites to players who play a ton of him. 

For complete details on the PBE, check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any other questions.

I've been waiting 2+ years on two accounts and haven't gotten in, the truth is they use a broken queue system. Some people are trashed and have no hope of getting back into queue without making new accounts.
